plugin.name: Main
plugin.description:
New Extensible RF Sources (NERFS) is a comprehensive overhaul of the RF Receiver's functionality.
Feature overview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7sdVkImQS_Q
• Expands the frequency range from 300 to 999 (configurable in MCM) • Adds interesting new sources of RF noise, like EM anomalies and cellular interference • Unique new sound effects for psy interference and GSM noise • Define up to 9 preset frequencies in MCM, and assign a different hotkey to each • Change frequency or presets with mouse wheel (requires modded binaries 20230701 or newer) • Adds an optional HUD indicator of signal strength, configurable for accessibility or preference • Compatible with TB's RF tasks, Reworked RF Receiver, and Remote Controlled Explosives

plugin.name: Install ARFS DLTX
plugin.description:
Install Anomalous RF Signals addon for moddded binaries that support DLTX.
ARFS adds lootable lore notes that drop randomly from dead stalkers, giving the player a diegetic way to learn about useful RF frequencies through gameplay.
GAMMA, EFP, and Screen Space Shaders are all based on the demonized binaries, and support DLTX. If you are running unmodified vanilla executables, DO NOT select this option.

plugin.name: Install ARFS Non-DLTX
plugin.description:
Install Anomalous RF Signals addon for vanilla binaries, or modpacks which do not support DLTX.
ARFS adds lootable lore notes that drop randomly from dead stalkers, giving the player a diegetic way to learn about useful RF frequencies through gameplay.
If you are still using vanilla binaries, it is STRONGLY recommended that you upgrade to the demonized modded binaries, which can be downloaded here: https://github.com/themrdemonized/xray-monolith

plugin.name: Do not install
plugin.description: Do not install the ARFS module at all. Lore notes with information about RF frequencies will not be added to stalker loot tables.

plugin.name: Do not install the patch
plugin.description:
Bizarre Interference is an optional third-party addon which adds new sound effects that the RF Receiver can pick up during emissions. It can be downloaded here: https://www.moddb.com/mods/stalker-anomaly/addons/bizarre-interference
If you are not already using the Bizarre Interference addon, using the patch will crash your game--so unless you like collecting stack traces, just leave this default selected so that it isn't installed.

plugin.name: Install the patch
plugin.description:
Bizarre Interference is an optional third-party addon which adds new sound effects that the RF Receiver can pick up during emissions. It can be downloaded here: https://www.moddb.com/mods/stalker-anomaly/addons/bizarre-interference
If you are using Bizarre Interference, then you must install the patch in order to get the full expanded variety of sound effects from that addon. If so, select this option.
